jp_name: 自動販売タイムマシン Jidōhanbai taimu mashin
description: This gadget can sell anything through the time.

jp_name: 声のキャンディー Koe no kyandī
description: First say anything to the mike, this will record one's voice. Then the gadget will turn it into a candy. Get another person to eat the candy and he/she will have the speaker's voice. The effect will wear off after half an hour. He/She can also change into another voice.
appears_in: I'll Become a Singer By Eating Candy

description: When a person drinks the medicine, it solidifies their speech by firing a physical manifestation of the content. For say, if the person shouted 'Ya!', a corresponding Katakana letter 'Ya' (ヤ) will come out. Meanwhile, İf user shouts 'Ro' it will became an object shaped like "ロ". The letter's velocity is slightly slower than sound, and it does bounce off or be absorbed into hard surfaces and soft surfaces respectively (because their properties is rather similar to sound). The letters can maintain their velocity and momentum for a surprising amount of time and so may serve as transportation on their own.
appears_in: Flying Through the Sky on the Letter "ワ"
Move Fast, Doraemon! The Galactic Grandprix
Doraemon: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure in the Antarctic Kachi Kochi

jp_name: のろいのカメラ Noroi no Kamera
description:
When used, Voodoo Camera is able to spawn voodoo dolls relevant to the targeted person.
The spawned voodoo dolls are able to transmit any form of damage inflicted on it to the relevant target. 
It will lead to fatal if used improperly or if in the hands of wrong person.
